duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee administrative operations and coordinate complex conferences and events.
Draft documents and correspondence, manage calendars and travel arrangements.
Handle financial transactions, ensure maintenance services, and provide supervision and leadership to student and temporary workers.
Create, maintain, modify, and ensure accuracy of content in various unit documents, displays, reports, brochures, and websites.
Plan and schedule calendars, resolve calendaring conflicts, and arrange travel in compliance with policies.
Create complex reports and oversee complex financial transactions.
Coordinate and monitor routine maintenance services completion, plan office moves and renovation projects.
Lead staff or supervise day-to-day work of student and temporary workers.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma and four years of administrative experience, or combination of education and relevant experience.
